thread.title: Video: Science teacher proposes to maths teacher in front of the class
thread.title_full: Video: Science teacher proposes to maths teacher in front of the class

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE
title: Video: Science teacher proposes to maths teacher in front of the class
text:
The video is going viral (Photo: YouTube) Videos and images of thrilling proposals have been shared from across the world ever since social media emerged as one daredevil decided to propose to his girlfriend while on top of a bridge, while in some cases it went wrong with the either the ring falling in a stream or the bride collapsing out of too much excitement.
People hardly remember math and science classes during school, but one such session which seemed like just another class turned out to be memorable for fifth graders in US, as their science teacher popped the question to the maths teacher in the middle of the class.
The students were visibly left stunned by this sudden development and screamed out in excitement as loud cheers echoed in the class room with the maths teacher giving her nod.
Click below to watch
